section.p: You step back to the window. The concubine suddenly sits up; her pale white face, framed with long dark hair, looks like the moon shining in a black night sky. You think it is all up, but she just smiles coyly at you, and turns over.
You make your way back down the tower, without a hitch.
The next day you pay a visit to Lochos Veshtu at the headquarters of the Brotherhood of the Night. .
